page.title: 18RECREATION IN GLADESTRY
page.content: There is not much in the village for young people. There is no youth club. The nearest youth club is Kington, or there is the Young Farmers, which meets in the Radnor Valley. Sometimes there are discos in the village hall. A lot of young people have to go out of Gladestry to meet other people. Some of them go to the pub instead, and some are busy at home on the farm. For ladies there is the W.I. This means the Women's Institute. The W.I. meets every month in the hall. They have visiting speakers and outings. They also have a Rounders team. There is not much for men to do, so a lot of them go to the pub. There is a football team called Vale of Arrow. You can play golf at Rhosgoch or Kington. The nearest public swimming pool is at Hereford. Some of the farmers go shooting.
